data.title: Michel Ocelot: A World of Animated Images
data.meta_description:

data.text: The first comprehensive study on the great filmmaker Michel Ocelot. It will be of interest to both film experts and amateurs, due to the notoriety of the subject and the jargon-free tone of the text. Provides an interdisciplinary approach, with particular attention given to the themes of multiculturalism, discrimination, and treatment of women.
